Package mediator

Class RmiClient

java.lang.Object
mediator.RmiClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, RentingSystem, NamedPropertyChangeSubject, utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>, utility.observer.listener.RemoteListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>
public class RmiClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements RentingSystem, utility.observer.listener.RemoteListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>, NamedPropertyChangeSubject
The client program obtains a stub for the registry on the server's host and looks up the remote object's stub by name in the registry.
Version:
1.0.0 2021
Author:
Group8-SEP2

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    RmiClient()
    Zero-argument constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • RmiClient

      public RmiClient()
      Zero-argument constructor. It obtains and sets the stub from the registry.

  • Method Details

    • addOffer

      public java.lang.String addOffer​(Offer offer)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to add an offer to the shared offer list.
      Specified by:
      addOffer in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      offer - Offer to be added to the server.
      Returns:
      It returns a String that confirms if the offer has been added or not. It returns null if an exception is thrown and it is not a RemoteException.

    • login

      public User login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to log into the system.
      Specified by:
      login in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      username - Username for the login.
      password - Password for the login.
      Returns:
      It returns the object of the requested user if the credentials are correct, otherwise it returns null.

    • signUp

      public boolean signUp​(User user)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to register an account into the system.
      Specified by:
      signUp in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      user - The user object sent to the server to be stored and registered.
      Returns:
      False, if an user with the same username already exists, true if not.

    • getUsersOnline

      public OnlineUserList getUsersOnline()
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to get the list of the onlineUsers.
      Specified by:
      getUsersOnline in interface RentingSystem
      Returns:
      An OnlineUserList object containing the users online registered by the server.

    • getOffers

      public OfferList getOffers()
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to get the list of the offers available.
      Specified by:
      getOffers in interface RentingSystem
      Returns:
      An OfferList object containing the offers registered in the server.

    • sendMessage

      public java.lang.String sendMessage​(User sender, java.lang.String receiver, java.lang.String body)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to send a message to an another user registered in the system.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      sender - User object of the sender of the message.
      receiver - String containing the username of the user who is supposed to receive to message.
      body - String object containing the body of the message sent.
      Returns:
      A String containing the result of the action telling if it ended successfully or if it faced any error.

    • sendRequest

      public void sendRequest​(java.lang.String offerer, Offer offer)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to send a request to a landlord for a property.
      Specified by:
      sendRequest in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      offerer - A String object of the username of the user who is making the offer for the landlord.
      offer - The Offer object of the offer interested.

    • getRentingList

      public RentingList getRentingList​(java.lang.String username)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to obtain the list of the Renting objects related to user who has the same username has the one passed as argument.
      Specified by:
      getRentingList in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user who is requiring its list of renting deals.
      Returns:
      the RentingList object stored in the server.

    • publishFeedback

      public void publishFeedback​(java.lang.String role, java.lang.String feedback, Renting renting)
      Method invoked remotely from the server to publish a feedback related to a closed renting deal.
      Specified by:
      publishFeedback in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the user who is publishing the feedback.
      feedback - The text of the feedback.
      renting - The Renting object where the feedback will be published.

    • acceptRequest

      public void acceptRequest​(java.lang.String usernameOfOfferer, Offer offer)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to accept a request from a tenant for a property.
      Specified by:
      acceptRequest in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      usernameOfOfferer - The username of the user who sent the request
      offer - The Offer object for which the request was sent.

    • refuseRequest

      Specified by:
      refuseRequest in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      offer - The Offer object of the offer where the request was sent

    • applyFilters

      public java.util.ArrayList<Offer> applyFilters​(double minPrice, double maxPrice, int noOfRooms, java.lang.String type, int floor, double deposit)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to obtain the list of the Offer objects for filter search
      Specified by:
      applyFilters in interface RentingSystem
      Parameters:
      minPrice - The minimum price for filter search.
      maxPrice - The maximum price for filter search.
      noOfRooms - The number of rooms in a Offer for filter search.
      type - The type of Offer for filter search.
      floor - The floor from Offer for filter search.
      deposit - The deposit from Offer for filter search.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList with filtered offers stored in the database.

    • addListener

      public void addListener​(java.lang.String propertyName, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Method to add a listener to the PropertyChangeSupport object.
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface NamedPropertyChangeSubject
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String containing the name of the property the listener will listen to.
      listener - PropertyChangeListener object which represents the listener to the property.

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener​(java.lang.String propertyName, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Method to remove a listener to the PropertyChangeSupport object.
      Specified by:
      removeListener in interface NamedPropertyChangeSubject
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String containing the name of the property the listener will stop to listen to.
      listener - PropertyChangeListener object which represents the listener to the property.

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange​(utility.observer.event.ObserverEvent<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> event) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method called whenever a change in the properties of the RemoteModel server happens, because the RmiClient is its listener.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface utility.observer.listener.RemoteListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>
      Parameters:
      event - ObserverEvent object which contains details about the event.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - If there are errors in the communication.
